result.execSummary:
The defendant Stacey L. Solomon was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Maintain Drug Trafficking Place, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.42(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Maintain GFE in full time employment/schooling/combination of the two, when not fully engaged complete nine hours community service per week.
Maintain absolute sobriety from illegal drugs and alcohol.

If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  

A copy of the police report has been electronically sent to the probation office.

Complete any assessment, treatment, or counseling deemed necessary by agent.

Complete AODA assessment with follow through.

DNA sample.

Jail sentence may be transferred to Milwaukee Co.

timeConds.notes: Imposing one month and stay remaining eight months, which may be lifted by agent for rule violations; 45 days to report.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

supervisions.notes:
1 year MCJ with Huber for work if def qualifies. No objection to remaining jail time being transferred to Milwaukee County.
Concurrent with: each other
Unpaid costs converted to Civil Judgment

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

Clerk: Kimberly
Case Called: 3:53pm
INCLUDES 15CF1134, 15CM2266, 16CF1049
State appears by ADA Kerri Puig. Defendant appears in person with Atty Robert Gardner

Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed.  VRCW.
State moves to:
15CF1134:
Ct. 1 Possess w/intent- THC (<=200 grams) >> D&RI
Ct. 2 Possess w/intent- Designer Drugs (<=3g) >> D&RI
Ct. 3 Possess w/intent- Heroin (<=3g) >> D&RI
Ct. 4 Possess Firearm- Convicted of a Felony >> D&RI
Ct. 6 Possess Drug Paraphernalia >> D&RI
15CM2266:
Ct. 1 Operate w/o valid license (2nd w/in 3 yrs) >> D&RI
16CF1049:
Ct. 2 Possess Drug Paraphernalia- repeater >> D&RI
Ct. 3 Bail Jumping- Misdemeanor- repeater >> D&RI
COURT grants above

PLEA:
15CF1134:
Ct. 5 Maintain Drug Trafficking Place >> NO CONTEST
16CF1049:
Ct. 1 Bail Jumping- Felony- repeater >> NO CONTEST

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty. 
COURT ORDERS: 15CF1134 Ct. 5- w/hold sentencing. 3 years probation. Concurrent to 16CF1049 Ct. 1. CONDITIONS: Complete any assessment, treatment, or counseling deemed necessary agent. Complete AODA assessment with follow through. Maintain absolute sobriety from illegal drugs and alcohol. Maintain GFE in full time employment/schooling/combination of two, when not fully engaged complete 9 hours community service per week. Pay CC. Pay DNA surcharge and provide sample. Serve 9 months conditional jail; imposing 1 month out of those 9 months jail and stay remaining 8 months jail which may be lifted by agent for rule violations. Deft has 45 days to report to jail. Jail sentence may be transferred to Milwaukee County Jail. If revoked, 6 days credit granted.
COURT ORDERS: 16CF1049 Ct. 1- w/hold sentencing. 3 years probation. Concurrent to 15CF1134 Ct. 5. CONDITIONS: Complete any assessment, treatment, or counseling deemed necessary agent. Complete AODA assessment with follow through. Maintain absolute sobriety from illegal drugs and alcohol. Maintain GFE in full time employment/schooling/combination of two, when not fully engaged complete 9 hours community service per week. Pay CC. Pay DNA surcharge and provide sample. If revoked, 3 days credit granted. 

Any cash bonds to be applied to CC and remaining cash to be returned to poster.
Adj: 4:15pm
